author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: KULR Plans to Raise Up to $300M to Fuel Bitcoin Purchases
description: The energy-management firm will fund additional bitcoin purchases, working capital and R&D with the “at the market” share sales.
content:
Energy-management firm KULR (KULR) is looking to raise up to $300 million by selling shares of its common stock in an at-the-market (ATM) offering facilitated by Cantor Fitzgerald.
The funds will be… [+1052 chars]
